# Test Fixtures

## test-image.jpg

Please add a test image here before running Playwright tests.

You can:
1. Copy any `.jpg` image file to this directory and name it `test-image.jpg`
2. Or download one: `curl -o test-image.jpg "https://picsum.photos/800/600"`

The image will be used to test:
- File upload functionality
- Google Vision API label detection
- History grid display
- Image analysis results

**Note**: The image should be:
- Format: JPG, PNG, or WebP
- Size: < 10MB
- Dimensions: Any reasonable size (e.g., 800x600)
